text: Alismatales is an order of flowering plants with 14 families. They are Monocots which live in marshy and aquatic (water) habitats. == Classification == * Order Alismatales **: family Alismataceae (including Limnocharitaceae) **: family Aponogetonaceae **: family Araceae **: family Butomaceae **: family Cymodoceaceae **: family Hydrocharitaceae **: family Juncaginaceae **: family Posidoniaceae **: family Potamogetonaceae **: family Ruppiaceae **: family Scheuchzeriaceae **: family Tofieldiaceae **: family Zosteraceae
title: Alismatales
